Title: FCT workers seek urgent action to address welfare concerns
Summary: Workers of the Federal Capital Territory Administration under the Joint Union Action Congress (JUAC) have appealed for urgent action on unresolved welfare issues affecting their morale and productivity . The President of the union, Mrs Rifkatu Iortyer, made the appeal at the JUAC conference .

Title: Oloka killing: Three arrested as Makinde compensates victims’ families
Summary: Oyo State Governor Seyi Makinde announced compensation of N5 million each for the families of forest guards recently killed at the Old Oyo National Park . The governor also approved scholarships up to university level for the children of the victims .

Title: Court to deliver judgment in fresh suit challenging Tinubu’s emergency power
Summary: Federal High Court in Abuja fixed March 9 for judgment in a fresh suit challenging the legal authority of President Bola Tinubu to remove elected state officials during a state of emergency . Justice James Omotosho fixed the date for judgment .

Title: Mudasiru pledges to advance FAEO mandate after board appointment
Summary: Engr. Bola Mudasiru pledged to advance the goals of the Federation of African Engineering Organisations (FAEO) following his appointment to the federation’s Executive Board External .

Title: MPAC urges govt, others to adopt Imam Abubakar’s model of peaceful coexistence
Summary: Muslim Public Affairs Centre (MPAC), Nigeria, urges govt, others to adopt Imam Abubakar’s model of peaceful coexistence and nation-building . MPAC urges religious leaders, educators, media organisations and policymakers to uphold and promote the legacy of the late Imam .

Title: 7 degrees that can land you high-paying jobs in France
Summary: Employers in France are giving preference to applicants with solid academic credentials and real-world experience as industries change and the race for top positions heats up .

Title: Uganda opposition leader Bobi Wine ‘escapes’ house arrest
Summary: Ugandan opposition leader Bobi Wine said he escaped a police raid on his home the previous night . He said he was being hunted by security forces .

Title: AFCON Final: Senegal accuse Morocco of sabotage ahead of clash for gold
Summary: Senegal was allotted less than 3,000 tickets, and juts two VVIP tickets . In the 53,000-capacity Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium, Senya was allotted just three tickets . Senegal will play Morocco in the AFCON Final on Sunday .

Title: Americans increasingly reject immigration police methods
Summary: US immigration agents now remind many Americans of the Gestapo -- and not just the left-wing activists who have taken to the streets to protest violent raids commanded by President Donald Trump .

Title: Budgets: FG spends N38.2bn on Gowon, Obasanjo, IBB, others in 22 years
Summary: By the end of this year, the Federal Government would have spent, at least, N38.188 billion on the up-keep of former presidents, vice presidents and their families .
